Subject: Currently use File activity monitor can we use this same sql server for Enterprise auditor
Description: Can/should we use the same sql server and app server for enterprise auditor that we use for activity monitor?
Solution_Comment__c:
Noted that Netwrix Activity Monitor (NAM) Dose not have a Database storage component,

It is recommend that Netwrix Enterprise Auditor (NEA) formally StealthAUDIT (SA) be on its own SQL server and instance.
 
Referred to the following:
Netwrix Enterprise Auditor v11.6 >Requirements > SQL Server Requirements
https://helpcenter.netwrix.com/bundle/EnterpriseAuditor_11.6/page/Content/EnterpriseAuditor/Requirements/Overview.htm#sql_server_requirements 

Netwrix Enterprise Auditor v11.6 > Installation > Installation & Configuration Overview > Enterprise Auditor Database
https://helpcenter.netwrix.com/bundle/EnterpriseAuditor_11.6/page/Content/EnterpriseAuditor/Install/Application/Database.htm
